Text.Page:
Don't be afraid. Batooni not here to kill you. I love peace. Would you help me?

There's a place called the Tuwangi Mire south of here. Tuwangis were living peacefully there. But the stonehammer tuwangis tricked tuwangis to turn against the humans.

I will take you to a place called the Marshlands. I can take you there at a blink of an eye, and you can meet with {@LinkCreature:205#1017#Rathe}. Tell him you're there to help tuwangis.

A tuwangi riding a huge toad sent you? Oh, my, not again...

It may be an urgent issue for them, but ten people a week come here because of him.

Who cares if the tuwangi tribes riot against each other? Those little frog-looking things act like they're the center of the world, but all they do is wander around in a pack and strike drums.

Well, you're here, so I'd appreciate it if you'd help out here at the camp. Beats looking at the "scenery"â€”a soggy marsh covered in mud.
